home.title: EmpowerHub
home.subtitle: Ho Matlafatsa Basadi ka Tshehetso e Kopaneng
home.tagline: Ho matlafatsa boikemelo, tshireletso le seriti.

financialSupport.title: Tshehetso ya Ditjhelete
financialSupport.description: Fumana dikeletso tsa matsete tse hlophisitsweng bakeng sa wena mme o kenele dikopanong tsa ditjhelete tse matlafatsang.

gbvSupport.title: Tshehetso ya GBV
gbvSupport.description: Fumana tshehetso e potlakileng le dibaka tsa bodulo tse sireletsehileng ha o di hloka haholo.

sanitaryAid.title: Thuso ya Bohloeki
sanitaryAid.description: Fumana mabokose a dimpho a haufi le ho fumana disebediswa tsa bohloeki tse bohlokwa.

aiAssistant.title: Mothusi wa AI
aiAssistant.description: Fumana dikarabo tse potlakileng le tataiso ho tswa tsamaisong ya rona ya tshehetso e bohlale.

submitRequests.title: Romela Dikopo
submitRequests.description: Romela mme o latele dikopo tsa hao tsa tshehetso ka tsamaiso ya rona e bonolo ho e sebedisa.

aboutUs.title: Ka Rona
aboutUs.description: Ithute haholwanyane ka sepheo sa rona sa ho matlafatsa basadi ho pholletsa le Afrika Borwa.

cta.title: O se o Ikemiseditse ho Qala?
cta.description: Ikopanye le dikete tsa basadi ba fumaneng tshehetso le matla sebakeng sa rona.
cta.button: Romela Kopo ya Hao ya Pele

sanitaryAid.title: Thuso ya Bohloeki & Tshehetso ya Tlhaho
sanitaryAid.subtitle: Fumana dihlahiswa tsa mahala tsa bohloeki le ditlhoko tsa tlhaho mabokoseng a rona a dimpho Afrika Borwa

capeTown.name: Setsi sa Sechaba sa Cape Town
capeTown.address: 123 Main Street, Cape Town, Western Cape
capeTown.description: Setsi se seholo sa sechaba se fanang ka dihlahiswa tsa bohloeki tsa bohlokwa ho basadi ba lehae.

johannesburg.name: Setsi sa Basadi sa Johannesburg
johannesburg.description: Setsi se ikemiseditseng ho thusa basadi ka dihlahiswa tsa bohloeki le tshehetso.

durban.name: Setsi sa Bophelo sa Durban
durban.description: Setsi sa bophelo se fanang ka dihlahiswa tsa bohloeki le thuto ya bophelo.

tips.tip1: Fetola dipete kapa ditampone kamehla ka hora tse 4-6
tips.tip2: Hlatswa matsoho a hao pele le ka mora ho sebedisa dihlahiswa tsa kgwedi
tips.tip3: Sebedisa dihlahiswa tse hloekileng tse sa nang kotsi
tips.tip4: Boloka dihlahiswa tse sa sebediswang sebakeng se omileng, se phodileng

tips.tip1: Hlapa 'mele o moholo ka letsatsi kamehla ka sesepa se bonolo
tips.tip2: Apara diaparo tse hloekileng, tse omileng
tips.tip3: Boloka sebaka sa hao sa poraefete se le hloekileng le se omileng
tips.tip4: Noa metsi a mangata le ho ja dijo tse nang le phepo e nepahetseng

tips.tip1: Masapo a hloekileng a ka sebediswa e le kgetho ya nako e khutshwane
tips.tip2: Dieta tse tshehla di ka thusa ho fokotsa bohloko ba kgwedi
tips.tip3: Metsi a chesang a ka thusa ho phomola mesifa
tips.tip4: Batla thuso ya bongaka haeba ho na le mathata a sa tlwaelehang

donation.title: Nehelana ka Dihlahiswa
donation.description: Re amohela dimpho tsa dihlahiswa tsa bohloeki ho thusa basadi ba lehae. Dilo tsena di hlokahala haholo:

items.sanitaryProducts: Dihlahiswa tsa bohloeki ba kgwedi (dipete, ditampone, dikomiki)
items.hygieneItems: Dilo tsa bohloeki (sesepa, shampoo, borashele ya meno)
items.underwear: Diaparo tsa ka hare tse ntjha, tse sa sebediswang

requests.title: Dikopo tsa Tshehetso
requests.subtitle: Romela dikopo tse ntjha mme o latele tse seng di le teng
requests.noRequestsDesc: Qala ka ho romela kopo ya hao ya pele ya tshehetso
requests.name: Lebitso

req001.description: Ke batla dikeletso tsa matsete bakeng sa kgwebo e nyane

req002.name: Ha a tsejwe
req002.description: Ke hloka tlhahisoleseding ya sebaka sa tshireletso ka potlako

req003.description: Ke batla mabokose a dimpho a haufi a dihlahiswa tsa bohloeki

finance.title: Matla a Ditjhelete
finance.subtitle: Fumana dikeletso tsa ditjhelete tse hlophisitsweng, kena dikopanong tse matlafatsang, mme o hahele tsela ya hao ya boikemelo ba moruo

seminar1.title: Basadi Kgwebong: Ho Qala Matsete a Hao a Pele
seminar1.description: Ithute motheo wa matsete le kamoo o ka qalang kateng ho aha leruo la hao la bokamoso.

seminar2.title: Workshop ya Boikemelo ba Ditjhelete
seminar2.description: Maano a sebetsang a ho finyella boikemelo ba ditjhelete e le mosadi ya ikemetseng.

seminar3.title: Tekanyetso ya Tjhelete le ho Boloka bakeng sa Bo-mme ba Ikemetseng
seminar3.description: Bokgoni bo bohlokwa ba tekanyetso ya tjhelete le maano a ho boloka a hlophisitsweng bakeng sa bo-mme ba ikemetseng.

emergencyFund.title: Haha Letlotlo la Tshohanyetso
emergencyFund.description: Qala ka ho boloka ditjhelete tsa dikgwedi tse 3-6 bakeng sa maemo a sa lebellwang.

education.title: Tsetela Thutong ya Ditjhelete
education.description: Tsebo ke matla. Ithute ka tekanyetso ya tjhelete, matsete, le tlhophiso ya ditjhelete.

diversifyIncome.title: Fapanyetsa Kenelo ya Hao
diversifyIncome.description: Theha methopo e mengata ya kenelo ho eketsa botsitso ba ditjhelete.

retirement.title: Rulaganya Phomolo Hoo Hang
retirement.description: Ho qala hang ho feta, ho feta nako e telele tjhelete ya hao e nang le ho hola.

trackExpenses.title: Latela Ditshenyehelo tsa Hao
trackExpenses.description: Ho utlwisisa hore tjhelete ya hao e ya hokae ke mohato wa pele wa ho laola ditjhelete.

gbvSupport.title: Tshehetso ya GBV le Dibaka tsa Bodulo tse Sireletsehileng
gbvSupport.subtitle: Tshehetso e potlakileng le dibaka tsa bodulo tse sireletsehileng bakeng sa basadi ba tobaneng le tlhekefetso e thehilweng hodima bong

emergencyAlert.title: O Kotsing e Potlakileng?
emergencyAlert.description: Letsetsa 0800 428 428 (Setsi sa Taolo sa GBV) kapa 10111 (Mapodisi) hang-hang. Ditshebeletso tsena di fumaneha 24/7 mme di mahala ho hang.

safeHaven.name: Sebaka sa Bodulo sa Basadi sa Safe Haven
safeHaven.address: 123 Hope Street, Kapa, Kolone ya Bophirima
safeHaven.description: Sebaka se sireletsehileng se fanang ka tshehetso e felletseng bakeng sa basadi le bana ba balehelang tlhekefetso ya lapeng.

ubuntu.name: Sebaka sa Polokelo sa Basadi sa Ubuntu
ubuntu.description: Ho fana ka tikoloho e sireletsehileng ka ditshebeletso tsa tshehetso tse felletseng bakeng sa ba phelosang tlhekefetso e thehilweng hodima bong.

themba.name: Ntlo ya Themba
themba.description: Sebaka sa bodulo se thehilweng setjhabeng se fanang ka tshireletso e potlakileng le mananeo a boikemelo a nako e telele.

gbvCommand.name: Setsi sa Naha sa Taolo sa GBV
gbvCommand.description: Mohala wa thuso wa 24/7 o sa lefellweng bakeng sa thuso e potlakileng

police.name: Tshebeletso ya Mapodisi ya Afrika Borwa

lifeline.name: LifeLine National
lifeline.description: Keletso ya 24/7 le tshehetso ya mathata

childline.name: Childline Afrika Borwa
childline.description: Tshehetso bakeng sa bana ba maemong a mathata

medicalSupport.name: Tshehetso ya Bongaka
medicalSupport.description: E fumaneha dibakeng tsohle tsa bodulo

aiAssistant.title: Mothusi wa AI
aiAssistant.subtitle: Fumana dikarabo tse potlakileng le tataiso ho tswa tsamaisong ya rona ya tshehetso e bohlale
aiAssistant.welcomeMessage: Dumela! Ke mothusi wa hao wa EmpowerHub. Ke mona ho o thusa ka dipotso tsa dikeletso tsa ditjhelete, tshehetso ya GBV, thuso ya bohloeki, le ditshebeletso tse ding tsa tshehetso. Nka o thusa jwang kajeno?

questions.financialSeminars: Nka fumana jwang dikopano tsa ditjhelete?
questions.safeShelters: Nka fumana hokae dibaka tsa bodulo tse sireletsehileng?
questions.sanitaryProducts: Nka fumana jwang dihlahiswa tsa bohloeki?
questions.submitRequest: Nka romela jwang kopo ya tshehetso?

chat.status: O sebetsa • O ikemiseditse ho thusa
chat.keyboardHint: Tobetsa Enter ho romela, Shift+Enter bakeng sa mola o motjha

aiAssistant.footer: Bakeng sa taba tse potlakileng, ka kopo ikopanye le mehala ya rona ya tshohanyetso ka kotloloho

mockResponses.response1: Ke utlwisisa hore o batla thuso. Ke tla o fa tataiso ka sehlooho seo.
mockResponses.response2: Eo ke potso e ntle! Ho latela potso ya hao, ke kgothaletsa hore o shebe maqephe a rona a ikgethileng a tshehetso bakeng sa tlhahisoleseding e qaqileng.
mockResponses.response3: Ke mona ho thusa! Bakeng sa thuso e potlakileng ka taba tse potlakileng, ka kopo se ke wa qeqa ho ikopanya le mehala ya rona ya tshohanyetso.
mockResponses.response4: Kea leboha ka ho ikopanya. Nka thusa ho o hokahanya le disebediswa tse nepahetseng le ditshebeletso tsa tshehetso.
mockResponses.response5: Eo ke potso e bohlokwa. Sethala sa rona se fana ka tshehetso e felletseng ho pholletsa le ditshebeletso tsa ditjhelete, tshireletso, le bophelo.

about.title: Ka EmpowerHub
about.subtitle: EmpowerHub e matlafatsa basadi Afrika Borwa ka ho fana ka dikeletso tsa matsete tse hlophisitsweng le dikopano, tshehetso e potlakileng ya GBV le dibaka tsa bodulo tse sireletsehileng, le phihlello ya mabokose a dimpho a bohloeki. Tharollo ena e kopaneng e bontsha boitlamo ba rona ho matlafatsa boikemelo, tshireletso le seriti.
about.missionText: Ho theha sethala se kopaneng se matlafatsang basadi ho pholletsa le Afrika Borwa ka ho fana ka ditshebeletso tsa tshehetso tse felletseng tse sebetsanang le boikemelo ba ditjhelete, tshireletso ya motho, le ditlhoko tsa motheo tsa bohloeki tharong e le nngwe e fumanehang.

financialEmpowerment.title: Matla a Ditjhelete
financialEmpowerment.description: Dikeletso tsa matsete tse hlophisitsweng, dikopano tsa ditjhelete, le disebediswa tsa ho aha boikemelo ba moruo.

gbvSupport.title: Tshehetso ya GBV
gbvSupport.description: Tshehetso e potlakileng le dibaka tsa bodulo tse sireletsehileng bakeng sa basadi ba tobaneng le tlhekefetso e thehilweng hodima bong.

sanitaryAid.title: Thuso ya Bohloeki
sanitaryAid.description: Phihlello ya dihlahiswa tsa bohloeki tse bohlokwa ka mabokose a dimpho a behilweng ka bohlale.

empowerment.title: Matla
empowerment.description: Re dumela ho matlafatsa boikemelo ba basadi ka thuto, disebediswa le tshehetso.

safety.title: Tshireletso
safety.description: Ho netefatsa phihlello e potlakileng ya dibaka tse sireletsehileng le tshehetso bakeng sa basadi maemong a mathata.

dignity.title: Seriti
dignity.description: Ho fana ka disebediswa tse bohlokwa ha ho ntse ho bolokwa seriti le lekunutu la mosadi e mong le e mong.

community.title: Setjhaba
community.description: Ho aha marang-rang a matla a tshehetso ka matsapa a tsamaiswang ke setjhaba le tshebedisano.

about.techDescription: EmpowerHub e sebedisa theknoloji ya sejoalejoale ho fana ka sethala sa tshehetso se kopaneng. Pontshiso ya rona ya hajwale e bontsha sesebeliswa sa mosebedisi le tshebetso ya motheo, le meralo ya ho kopanya dikarolo tse tsoetseng pele tse kenyelletsang:

futureFeaturesList.aiSupport: Tshehetso e tsamaiswang ke AI le dikeletso
futureFeaturesList.metamask: Kopanyo ya MetaMask bakeng sa dikgwebisano tse sireletsehileng

about.demoNote: Pontshiso ena e bontsha mohopolo wa tharollo e kopaneng, e hlophisitsweng ho dumella ntlafatso e ikemetseng ya dikarolo ha ho ntse ho bolokwa boiphihlelo ba mosebedisi bo tshwanang. Sebopeho sa modular se dumella dikatlehiso tsa bokamoso ntle le ho sitisa tshebetso ya motheo.
